schema.description: The BFD for PW session enters the down state and the corresponding link fails.
The BFD for PW session enters the up state and the detection on the corresponding link is normal.
The BFD session enters the down state and the corresponding link fails.
The BFD session Down alarm was cleared.
The BFD session enters the up state and the detection on the corresponding link is normal.
The BFD for IPv6 MultiHop session enters the down state and the corresponding link fails.
The BFD for IPv6 MultiHop session enters the up state and the link detection is normal.
The BFD for IPv6 SingleHop session enters the down state and the corresponding link fails.
The BFD for IPv6 SingleHop session enters the up state and the detection on the corresponding link is normal.
The number of all the BFD bit-error-detection sessions set up on interface boards reached the PAF upper limit and no more bit-error-detection session can be set up.

total-bit-error-detect-session-limit.description: Indicates the upper limit of global BFD bit-error-detection sessions.

schema.description: The number of all the BFD sessions set up on interface boards reached the PAF upper limit and no more session can be set up.

total-session-limit.description: Indicates the upper limit of global BFD sessions.

schema.description: The notification was generated when the number of BFD sessions bound to the interface on the interface board reached the PAF upper limit and no more BFD session bound to the interface can be set up.

session-limit-per-board.description: Indicates the allowable maximum number of BFD sessions on each board.

schema.description: The BFD IPv6 session state changed to Down.

diagnosis.description: Indicates information about session diagnostic characters.

bind-type.description: Binding type: - 2 or 3: Peer Ip Address: detects the multi-hop IP link. - 1 or 4: Interface: detects the single-hop IP link. - 9: LDP_LSP: detects the LDP LSP. - 11: TE_LSP: detects the LSP bound to the TE tunnel. - 12: TE_TUNNEL: detects the TE tunnel. - 13: PW: detects the PW. - 15: VSI_PW: detects the VSI PW.

static-lsp-name.description: Static LSP name NOTE: The value is constantly'-'.

schema.description: The BFD IPv6 session state changed to Up.

diagnosis.description: Indicates information about session diagnostic characters.

bind-type.description: Binding type: - 2 or 3: Peer Ip Address: detects the multi-hop IP link. - 1 or 4: Interface: detects the single-hop IP link. - 9: LDP_LSP: detects the LDP LSP. - 11: TE_LSP: detects the LSP bound to the TE tunnel. - 12: TE_TUNNEL: detects the TE tunnel. - 13: PW: detects the PW. - 15: VSI_PW: detects the VSI PW.

static-lsp-name.description: Static LSP name NOTE: The value is constantly'-'.

pw-secondary.description: Secondary PW identifier NextHop: Next hop address.

schema.description: The BFD session changed from another state to the Down state.

session-index.description: Indicates the index of the BFD session.

session-name.description: Indicates the configuration name of the BFD session.

peer-ip.description: Indicates the bound destination IP address.

bind-if-index.description: Indicates the index of the bound interface.

bind-if-name.description: Indicates the name of the bound interface.

diagnosis.description: Indicates information about session diagnostic characters. - 0: No diagnostic word - 1: Detection time Down - 2: Echo detection Down - 3: Neighbor advertisement Down - 4: Forwarding plane reset - 5: Path Down - 6: Cascading path Down - 7: Administratively Down - 8: Reverse cascading path Down - 9: Peer administratively Down - 25: IP error code stop - 26: IP error code start - 27: Section error code stop - 28: Section error code start - 29: LSP error code stop - 30: LSP ingress error code start - 31: LSP transit error code start.

vrf-index.description: Indicates the index of the bound VPN.

vpn-name.description: Indicates the name of the bound VPN.

use-default-ip.description: Indicates whether use the default multicast IP address.

bind-type.description: - 2 or 3: Peer Ip Address, detects the multi-hop IP link. - 1 or 4: Interface, detects the single-hop IP link. - 9: LDP_LSP, detects the LDP LSP. - 11: TE_LSP, detects the LSP bound to the TE tunnel. - 12: TE_TUNNEL, detects the TE tunnel. - 13: PW, detects the PW. - 15: VSI_PW, detects the VSI PW.

static-lsp-name.description: Indicates the name of the static LSP. NOTE: This parameter is always displayed as '-'.

pw-secondary.description: Indicates the ID of the secondary PW.

next-hop.description: Indicates the IP address of the next hop.

vc-id.description: Indicates the ID of the VC.

vsi-name.description: Indicates the name of the VSI.

vsi-peer-address.description: Indicates the destination address of the VSI.

peer-ipv6.description: Indicates the bound destination IPv6 address.

schema.description: The BFD session changed from another state to the Up state.

session-index.description: Indicates the index of the BFD session.

session-name.description: Indicates the configuration name of the BFD session.

peer-ip.description: Indicates the bound destination IP address.

bind-if-index.description: Indicates the index of the bound interface.

bind-if-name.description: Indicates the name of the bound interface.

diagnosis.description: Indicates information about session diagnostic characters. - 0: No diagnostic word - 1: Detection time Down - 2: Echo detection Down - 3: Neighbor advertisement Down - 4: Forwarding plane reset - 5: Path Down - 6: Cascading path Down - 7: Administratively Down - 8: Reverse cascading path Down - 9: Peer administratively Down - 25: IP error code stop - 26: IP error code start - 27: Section error code stop - 28: Section error code start - 29: LSP error code stop - 30: LSP ingress error code start - 31: LSP transit error code start.

vrf-index.description: Indicates the index of the bound VPN.

vpn-name.description: Indicates the name of the bound VPN.

use-default-ip.description: Indicates whether use the default multicast IP address.

bind-type.description: - 2 or 3: Peer Ip Address, detects the multi-hop IP link. - 1 or 4: Interface, detects the single-hop IP link. - 9: LDP_LSP, detects the LDP LSP. - 11: TE_LSP, detects the LSP bound to the TE tunnel. - 12: TE_TUNNEL, detects the TE tunnel. - 13: PW, detects the PW. - 15: VSI_PW, detects the VSI PW.

static-lsp-name.description: Indicates the name of the static LSP. NOTE: This parameter is always displayed as '-'.

pw-secondary.description: Indicates the ID of the secondary PW.

next-hop.description: Indicates the IP address of the next hop.

vc-id.description: Indicates the ID of the VC.

vsi-name.description: Indicates the name of the VSI.

vsi-peer-address.description: Indicates the destination address of the VSI.

peer-ipv6.description: Indicates the bound destination IPv6 address.
